1	10. Asebenza njani amalungu omthetho angundoqo ahlelwe eMzantsi Afrika?
2	10. Bonke ababahlali bachatshazelwe yindlela amapolisa enza ngawo umsebenzi wawo ngokunganelisiyo kule ngingqi.
3	10. Iya kungeniswa nini ngokupheleleyo inkonzo?
4	10. Kutheni kubakho isidingo sokuba ndime ebhasini ngamanye amaxesha ngelixa abanye behleli?
5	10. Lithini inani elisezantsi neliphezulu lesi sibonelelo kwaye usithini umyinge emandize nawo?

119	25 aur mandlee ke gine huae logon kee bhentt kee chandee sau kikkar, aur paavitrasthan ke shokel ke hisab se sattrah sau pachahattr shokel thee.
120	2.6 IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kweDrafti yesiCwangciso seSizwe sokuSebenza sokuLwa ubuHlanga, uCalu-calulo ngokobuHlanga, ukuBukulwa kwaBantu bangaPhandle kunye nokuNye ukungaNyamezelani okuFana Noku, ukuze uluntu luhlomle ngawo.
121	2.7 IKhabhinethi inikwe amagqabantshintshi ngomgama osele uhanjiwe ngenkqubo yokufudukela kwidijithali.
122	27 shaimee ke solah bette aur chh beattyaian hui parantu usake bhaiyon ke bahut bette n hue aur unaka sara kul yahoodiyon ke barabar n baddha.
123	28 mahalee se, aeleeajar jisake koi putra n tha. 29 keesh se kaeesh ke vansh men yaraola. 30 aur mooshaee ke putra, mahalee, aeder aur yareemota. apane apane pitaro ke gharanon ke anusar ye hee leveey santan ke the.
124	28 to gavaaiyon ke santan yarooshalem ke charon or ke desh se aur natopaatiyon ke ganvon se, 29 aur betagilagal se, aur geba aur ajmabet ke kheton se ikatthe huae kyonaki gavaaiyon ne yarooshalem ke asa-pas ganv basa liye the.
125	29 aur manashshoiyon ke sivane ke pas apane apane ganvon samet betashaan, tanak, maagio aur dora. in men israaael ke putra yusufa kee santan ke log rahate the.
126	29 aur un men se kuchh saman ke, aur pavitrasthan ke patraen ke, aur maaide, dakhmadha, tel, loban aur sugandhadrayyon ke adhaikaree ttharaae gaae the.
127	2. Abafundi ababona luzizi/abanorhatyazo lwamehlo baya kufumana iphepha lemibuzo elandiswe isayizi yefonti (font size) ukuba ibe ngu-Arial 16 kwiphepha elingu-A4, lo gama imizobo iya kwandiswa ize ifakwe njengesihlomelo (addendum).

137	2. Ezi mviwo zibhalelwa kumaziko eemviwo athile kuphela.
138	2. Ezinye izinto elingenakubekwa tyala ngazo iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, abathunywa kwiBhunga, nabantu ekuthethwe ngabo kwisiqendu 66 nesama-67 zinokutshiwo ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

327	4. UMthetho wePalamente ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (3) usenokuvumela nento yokuba– 1. naliphi na iqela elikhoyo libe liqela elinye nelinye iqela; okanye 2. naliphi na iqela lizale amanye amaqela.
328	4. Urhulumente wezwelonke noorhulumente bamaphondo mabathi, ngokuwis’ imithetho nangezinye iindlela, bakulawule kwaye bakubek’esweni ukusetyenziswa kweelwimi zabo zaseburhulumenteni.

5025	Le ngxelo ihambisa ithi iprojekti nganye kwezi izakufumana imali yayo engamakhulu amabini anamashumi amathandathu amawaka eerandi.
5026	Le ngxelo ihambisa ithi kukwavulwe inyoba yokuxolela bonke abo bathe bafumana ngomgunyathi imvume zokuhlala kweli, incwadi zazisi kwanezinye inkcukacha, kwaye bayacelwa ukuba bazibuyisele kwabasemagunyeni.
5027	Le ngxelo ikhuthaza ukuba ilizwe eli lamkele izinyanzeliso zamazwe ngamazwe nezeengingqi malunga neyona minyaka mincinci ivumelekileyo yabantwana abanokuthi baphule ngayo umthetho.
5028	Le ngxelo inika isishwankathelo sokuba ingaba uthotho lwemithetho, imigaqo-nkqubo neenkqubo ezisetyenziswayo iyasebenza na iphinde futhi inyathele kwizinto ezenziwe ngempumelelo lilizwe malunga nokuxhotyiswa kwabasetyhini kunye nolingwano ngokwesini.
